revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-N18U |revision=A1 (2.20) |series=N600 |upc=4716659562221 |asin=B00KPWLXYU;UK; |newegg=9SIA4UG2S02208 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG7116G |manuf_rev=A33 1-ASU |availability=no longer sold |price=170 |est_release_date=08/06/2014 |fcc_date=07/03/2014 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTN18U |ic_id=3568A-RTN18U |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47081A0;BCM47081A0KFEBG, TT1312 P10, 275089-07 B1B; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCKO |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=QAM-256, AiCloud support, Time Machine support |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36;brcmarm; |tp_firmware=AdvancedTomato, FreshTomato, HGG, Tomato (Shibby), [https://gzenux.github.io/asuswrt-rtn18u/ AsusWRT-Merlin (unofficially)] |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:22:0B |oui_eth=AC:22:0B }} {{TagLine|High-Power N600 Gigabit Wi-Fi Router}} :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-AC88U}} "ASUS RT-N18U REV 2.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|ASUS RT-N18UHP|ASUS RT-N800HP}} Per ''ASUS'''s product page, this device has 128MB Flash and 256MB RAM. *This device is using [[Broadcom]] BCM4360KMLG (3T3R) - :QAM-256 (TurboQAM) modes will be available for use. :RAM: 256MB (DDR3-1600), Flash: 128MB NAND (SLC) :1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 3x 2dbi antenna ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/168-asus-rt-n18u.html Review on '''FoxNetwork'''] *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/18041-updated-version-of-rt-n16-using-the-dual-core-processor-asus-rt-n18u Review on '''TechBang'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-n18u.shtml Review on '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/rt-n18u/ Review on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Forum threads=== *[http://tomatousb.ru/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=5078 On '''TomatoUSB''' forums] (RU) ===Probable included PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a :'''Leader Electronics''' MU18-R120150-A1. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=Leader Electronics |model=MU18-R120150 |revision=-A1 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.6 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |manuf_country=China |e_level=5 |style=medium, horiz. }} ===GPL info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info â€¢ >> |
export RT-N18U := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y ARM=y BCM57=y NTFS="paragon" HFS="paragon" 
 AUTODICT=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y MDNS=y MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y GRO=y 
 BECEEM=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y WEBDAV=y CLOUDSYNC=y STAINFO=y
 DROPBOXCLIENT=y FTPCLIENT=y SAMBACLIENT=y XHCI=y APP="installed" MODEMPIN=y
 BUILD_NAME="RT-N18U" PROXYSTA=y DNSMQ=y SHP=y NVRAM_64K=y BCMWL6=y BCMWL6A=y 
 TUNEK="n" BCM5301X=y DISK_MONITOR=y LANWAN_LED=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y  
 DUALWAN=y REPEATER=y ARMCPUSMP=up USER_LOW_RSSI=y OPENVPN=y TIMEMACHINE=y  
 VPNC=y BRCM_NAND_JFFS2=y JFFS2LOG=y XHCIMODE=y DEBUGFS=y SWEBDAVCLIENT=y
 BCM5301X_TRAFFIC_MONITOR=n DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y LINUX_MTD="64" BCM_RECVFILE=y 
 REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y MULTICASTIPTV=y USB="USB" SAMBA3=y QUAGGA=y
}} ===See also=== *[http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_N_family_chart/solution.html ''Asus Wireless-N networking solutions''] __NOTOC__
